db:abstract.db:para: The QPersistentModelIndex class is used to locate data in a data model.

db:listitem.db:para: QPersistentModelIndex is part of Implicitly Shared Classesmodel-view

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: A QPersistentModelIndex is a model index that can be stored by an application, and later used to access information in a model. Unlike the QModelIndex class, it is safe to store a QPersistentModelIndex since the model will ensure that references to items will continue to be valid as long as they can be accessed by the model.
It is good practice to check that persistent model indexes are valid before using them.

db:section.db:title: QPersistentModelIndex::QPersistentModelIndex(const QModelIndex &index)
db:section.db:para: Creates a new QPersistentModelIndex that is a copy of the model index.

db:section.db:title: QPersistentModelIndex::QPersistentModelIndex(const QPersistentModelIndex &other)
db:section.db:para: Creates a new QPersistentModelIndex that is a copy of the other persistent model index.

db:section.db:title: [noexcept, since 5.2] QPersistentModelIndex::QPersistentModelIndex(QPersistentModelIndex &&other)
db:section.db:para: Move-constructs a QPersistentModelIndex instance, making it point at the same object that other was pointing to.
This function was introduced in Qt 5.2.

db:section.db:title: QModelIndex QPersistentModelIndex::child(int row, int column) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the child of the model index that is stored in the given row and column.

db:section.db:title: int QPersistentModelIndex::column() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the column this persistent model index refers to.

db:section.db:title: QVariant QPersistentModelIndex::data(int role = Qt::DisplayRole) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the data for the given role for the item referred to by the index.

db:section.db:title: [since 4.2] Qt::ItemFlags QPersistentModelIndex::flags() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the flags for the item referred to by the index.
This function was introduced in Qt 4.2.

db:section.db:title: bool QPersistentModelIndex::isValid() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if this persistent model index is valid; otherwise returns false.
A valid index belongs to a model, and has non-negative row and column numbers.

db:section.db:title: const QAbstractItemModel *QPersistentModelIndex::model() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the model that the index belongs to.

db:section.db:title: QModelIndex QPersistentModelIndex::parent() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the parent QModelIndex for this persistent index, or an invalid QModelIndex if it has no parent.

db:section.db:title: int QPersistentModelIndex::row() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the row this persistent model index refers to.

db:section.db:title: QModelIndex QPersistentModelIndex::sibling(int row, int column) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the sibling at row and column or an invalid QModelIndex if there is no sibling at this position.

db:section.db:title: [noexcept, since 5.0] void QPersistentModelIndex::swap(QPersistentModelIndex &other)
db:section.db:para: Swaps this persistent modelindex with other. This function is very fast and never fails.
This function was introduced in Qt 5.0.

db:section.db:title: const QModelIndex &QPersistentModelIndex::operator const QModelIndex &() const
db:section.db:para: Cast operator that returns a const QModelIndex&.

db:section.db:title: bool QPersistentModelIndex::operator!=(const QModelIndex &other) const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if this persistent model index does not refer to the same location as the other model index; otherwise returns false.

db:section.db:title: [since 4.2] bool QPersistentModelIndex::operator!=(const QPersistentModelIndex &other) const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if this persistent model index is not equal to the other persistent model index; otherwise returns false.
This function was introduced in Qt 4.2.

db:section.db:title: [since 4.1] bool QPersistentModelIndex::operator<(const QPersistentModelIndex &other) const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if this persistent model index is smaller than the other persistent model index; otherwise returns false.
All values in the persistent model index are used when comparing with another persistent model index.
This function was introduced in Qt 4.1.

db:section.db:title: [noexcept, since 5.2] QPersistentModelIndex &QPersistentModelIndex::operator=(QPersistentModelIndex &&other)
db:section.db:para: Move-assigns other to this QPersistentModelIndex instance.
This function was introduced in Qt 5.2.

db:section.db:title: QPersistentModelIndex &QPersistentModelIndex::operator=(const QModelIndex &other)
db:section.db:para: Sets the persistent model index to refer to the same item in a model as the other model index.

db:section.db:title: QPersistentModelIndex &QPersistentModelIndex::operator=(const QPersistentModelIndex &other)
db:section.db:para: Sets the persistent model index to refer to the same item in a model as the other persistent model index.

db:section.db:title: bool QPersistentModelIndex::operator==(const QModelIndex &other) const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if this persistent model index refers to the same location as the other model index; otherwise returns false.
All values in the persistent model index are used when comparing with another model index.

db:section.db:title: bool QPersistentModelIndex::operator==(const QPersistentModelIndex &other) const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if this persistent model index is equal to the other persistent model index; otherwise returns false.
All values in the persistent model index are used when comparing with another persistent model index.

db:section.db:title: [noexcept, since 5.0] uint qHash(const QPersistentModelIndex &index, uint seed = 0)
db:section.db:para: Returns a hash of the QPersistentModelIndex index, using seed to seed the calculation.
This function was introduced in Qt 5.0.
